ai-patthana22.27:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.27:0.3_0: for the sake of self-developing cloth for the sake of Saṁsāra.
ai-patthana22.27:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of suspending the sake of non-existence, because of no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.27:1.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of suspending the sake of non-existence, conditioned by no cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.27:1.1_2: Not for the sake of not grasping, nor for the sake of resentment, or for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of health.
ai-patthana22.27:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.27:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of sustained thought arises in someone who has causes no cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.27:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of non-existence, this is the cause.
ai-patthana22.27:4.1_0: Not for the sake of initiative, or for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of robes, or for the sake of fun, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.27:4.1_1: the section on the same cause,
